basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Michael Metzger Memorial Endowed Scholarship for Economics

description: The Dr. Michael Metzger Memorial Endowed Scholarship is open to declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) majors who have completed a minimum of 60 hours at the time of application. Students must have a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA. Two faculty recommendations required (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation). This scholarship may only be used for tuition, books and fees. Eligibility Requirements Declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) majors Minimum of 60 hours completed Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Two faculty recommendations required (please indicate the two College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation) Award Requirements This scholarship may only be used for tuition, books and fees
